titleStmt.title: Politique discourses upon trueth and lying An instruction to princes to keepe their faith and promise: containing the summe of Christian and morall philosophie, and the duetie of a good man in sundrie politique discourses vpon the trueth and lying. First composed by Sir Martyn Cognet ... Newly translated out of French into English, by Sir Edward Hoby, Knight.
Instruction aux princes pour garder la foy promise. English
titleStmt.author: Coignet, Matthieu, sieur de La Thuillerie, 1514-1586.
Hoby, Edward, Sir, 1560-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [John Windet for] Ralfe Newberie. Cum gratia & priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Instruction aux princes pour garder la foy promise.
The four pages between p. 72 and 73 are each numbered 72.
Running title reads: Of truth and lying.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
